title: The Struggle for Abortion Rights in Mexico
itunes:title: The Struggle for Abortion Rights in Mexico
description:
We talk to Erika Yamada, a feminist and human rights activist in Mexico about the struggle for abortion rights and what we can learn from the Green Tide.

https://apps.who.int/iris/bitstream/handle/10665/278968/9789241550406-eng.pdf

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
